text: læa phwk cea cng raluk khna thi phwk cea mi canwn nxy sung pen phu xxnxæ nı phændin doythi phwk cea klaw wa phukhn ca chob cheiyw phwk cea pi læw phraxngkh di thrng pord hı phwk cea mi thiphak phing læa di thrng snabsnun phwk cea dwy kar chwyhelux khxng phraxngkh læa di thrng prathan paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea cak sing thi di «thanghlay pheux wa phwk cea ca di khxbkhun
